summary:
Enthusiastic, results- and value-driven, integrative leader with a people first mind-set, strong culture building and execution skills, and direct work experience in 35 countries
• Functional skills:  customer, operations, P&L, project, stakeholder, and strategic management; multi-channel sales, marketing, and brand building; business and market development; procurement; planning; process and resources optimisation; finance; turnarounds and transformations
• Soft skills:  leadership; empathy; alliance, partnership, relationship, and team building and development; negotiation, mediation, and influencing; facts-driven and purpose-led decision making; problem-solving skills; forward thinking

education.field_of_study: Liberal Arts and Sciences, General Studies and Humanities

profile_positions.description:
Created efood.pe, an eco-friendly, on-demand online supermarket offering personalised service and delivering premium fresh and dry goods procured via a short supply chain reliant on real-time inventory management

• Set and implemented strategy; built and guided a 20-person multifunctional team alongside outsourced support teams
• Drove category, market, and partnership development; focused on shopper engagement, service delivery, procurement, pricing, customer insights, metrics, P&L, resource, and workflow management
profile_positions.title: Founder and Interim CEO

profile_positions.description:
Led sales, business development, account and project management activities for civil engineering, interior developer, custom furniture manufacturer, and facilities management holding

• Increased turnover 19% y-o-y by obtaining four new accounts and 19 awards of incremental sales
profile_positions.title: Group Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
Initiated business development actions for expanding Spanish exporters by providing alliance and partnership facilitation, regulatory assessment, and commercial entry strategy elaboration and execution services

• Completed assignments for agricultural systems and equipment, cloud solutions, digital marketing, farming compounds, food service, household goods, retail intelligence SaaS, 3D-printing, and web analytics clients
profile_positions.title: Country Advisor - Peru

profile_positions.description:
• Elaborated online retail and wholesale US-Canada expansion plan for multi-brand organic garments and textiles brand
• Prepared operating plan for US last-mile delivery tech start-up and Amazon partner growing in Brazil, Chile and Mexico
• Applied predictive analytics to drive retail teams’ engagement and productivity for vertically integrated fashion house
• Crafted market entry strategies for e-learning platform, superfoods and wellness products merchant, digital payment systems and retail apps developer, and financial services provider expanding internationally
• Extended buyout bids to the ownership groups of seven Peruvian QSR and fast casual chains for American QSR holding
• Sought impact funding, introduced new KPIs, and reviewed options to implement a fast-growth business model for a 25-campus private school network directed at pupils from low-income inner city neighbourhoods
profile_positions.title: Management Consultant - International Expansion

company.name: Grupo Marathon / Nike Peru / The Athlete's Foot LatAm

profile_positions.company: Grupo Marathon / Nike Peru / The Athlete's Foot LatAm
profile_positions.description:
Directed a 900-person lifestyle and sports apparel and equipment holding with multi-country rights over a 50+ global brand portfolio helmed by NIKE -accountable for 12 omni-channel retail, wholesale, marketing, and back-office companies

•	Grew turnover organically by 29% y-o-y via new and existing key accounts, new territories penetration, new brands affiliation, new private label introductions, and new licensed product launches
• Actioned IT, logistics, marketing, PP&E, procurement, and security performance improvement projects and (re)negotiated supplier terms of trade through contract management
• Oversaw regional corporate development, merchandising, product management, new brand acquisitions, and positioning; acquired retail assets from former Hurley partner
• Headed Group-wide property function and facilities management services; renegotiated tens of industrial, office, and retail tenancy contracts, generating net savings of $10M+
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.company: Grupo Marathon / Nike Peru / The Athlete's Foot LatAm
profile_positions.description:
Led the turnaround and follow-on growth of an underperforming 500-FTE omnichannel retailer operating multi-brand concept, flagship, outlet, and pop-up stores; instiled an operational excellence culture; reformed sourcing, inventory, and category strategy; delivered a best-in-market in-store experience across its action, athletic, outdoor, and urban formats; also, co-headed Nike retail and launched and directed New Balance retail

• Increased Sales by 31% y-o-y and Same-store Sales by 14% y-o-y
• Managed The Athlete’s Foot Master Franchisee relationship with Intersport Group and expanded its LatAm footprint
• Developed and rolled-out new store designs, commercial layouts, and digital touchpoints, helping raise footfall by 15%
• Drove loss prevention and labour, last-leg, and reverse logistics cost reduction programmes
• Imparted own and Friedman’s retail sales training methods
• Implemented product lifecycle management; introduced verticals and specialists; streamlined inventory management
• Boosted customer engagement through social media platforms; from a standing start, built a 2.3M Facebook fan base
• Reduced retail network credit and debit card commissions payable to issuers by 40%, saving $1M+ per year
profile_positions.title: CEO - Retail BU

profile_positions.description:
Led Rigids' sales and business development function for Cryovac's agribusiness segment, providing bespoke packaging solutions, supplying packaging materials, and leading new product development

• Mapped market and competitor landscapes and built new sales territories of fruit and produce growers selling into British and European hypermarket, supermarket, convenience, fuel station, and eCommerce retail; entered four new countries, generated three direct sales strategic accounts, and grew brand awareness at trade fairs and events across Europe
• Sourced, affiliated, and managed agency and wholesale partners to build a network of storage and distribution hubs from which to service clients in high agricultural land-use intensity areas of Egypt, Morocco, Poland, Portugal, Spain, and the UK
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager EMEA & LatAm - Food Services Division

profile_positions.title: Management Consultant - Retail and Distribution

profile_positions.description:
Reformed a power and industrial equipment fleet rental and trading firm supplying the construction and oil & gas industries active in the Gulf States, clinching UAE’s 4th largest market share, behind global leaders Aggreko, GE, and Caterpillar

• Grew turnover 76% y-o-y (keeping profit margin) by gaining 15 new clients, raising existing account sales, introducing and cross-selling fuel supply and cooling systems rental, and shifting asset base to increase share of “blue chip” orders
• Directed total fleet management activities, from sourcing through retirement, and raised asset utilisation by 12%
• Attained ISC Certification by re-engineering Quality Management Systems order and continuous improvement processes
• Reduced amounts outstanding from doubtful and non-performing rentals by 25% y-o-y
profile_positions.title: General Manager

profile_positions.description:
Re-engineered business processes and practices for indoor environmental hygiene firm, specialised in servicing and decontaminating HVAC, water, and exhaust systems and equipment for private and public  institutional facilities across Spain

• Oversaw budget, compliance, cost, crew, document, equipment, fleet, inventory, QC, route, supplier, warehouse, and waste management
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Ran the Bank’s European Aerospace & Defence team:  led transaction origination, client development, and sector coverage
• Integrated sub-sector teams sourcing and executing corporate transactions for agricultural, lifting, and material handling equipment; building materials; energy; machinery; and mining clients in Austria, Brazil, Finland, France, Greece, Italy, Norway, Spain, Sweden, UK, and the US
• Drove business development actions linked to Spanish aerospace, energy, IT, property, and telecom industries

profile_positions.description:
Assisted project teams sourcing, assessing, structuring, and closing $100M to $4B property transactions across all asset classes for European and North American clients and the Firm's own account

• Advised a US/UK investor consortium on the largest intended portfolio acquisition in French history –solely responsible for the valuation and pricing of 39 development projects with a book value of $1B+
• Sourced and drove East Coast developments of US-wide expansion plan for a large-scale retail REIT
• Created a proprietary modelling tool to price multi-variable bids in retail leasehold interest auctions
profile_positions.title: Senior Financial Analyst - Investment Advisory
